title: Superhero Wordle
description: An interactive arcade-style word-guessing game where players guess superhero names, use hints strategically, and compete on a leaderboard.

title: Spotify Hit Harbor
description: collaborated with team of four to build a predictive model that can forecast the potential success of a song on the platform. It will check how the music world is changing and see how ads and marketing are doing.

title: VisiSolve
description: VisiSolve employs image processing and ML techniques to recognize handwritten mathematical equations. This project aims to overcome the challenges associated with interpreting handwritten symbols through a series of preprocessing steps and neural network evaluations.

title: Predictive Analytics for Vacant Buildings & Crime Trends
description: Processed and analyzed 8+ million crime records using SQL and Pandas, uncovering key spatial and temporal crime patterns linked to vacant buildings.
